page.title: 17WILD PLANTS.
page.content: ARROWHEAD Big arrow-shaped leaves which stick out of the water.There are also floating leaves and narrow underwater ones.White lowers (july-august) turn into round fruits. HORNWORT It looks like a little,underwater, bushy,fir tree!Feathery forked leaves which feel horny.Minute green flowers at the base of the leaves (july-september) You might also see white water lilies, stonewort,and other pondweeds. E.G. fennel pondweed with it's very thin bootlace like leaves.Crowfoot also occur. Other plants in the broads include pondweed,watercrest and water mint.
